connector-descriptor.name: Oracle Connector
connector-descriptor.description: This connector is written for Oracle Spatial. For more information on Oracle, visit http://oracle.com/

parameter.name: jdbcDriver
parameter.label: The JDBC driver (this must be in the classpath)

parameter.name: user
parameter.label: The username for connecting to the database

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: The password for connecting to the database

parameter.name: autoFlushDormantSeconds
parameter.label: Seconds of buffer inactivity that will trigger an auto-flush.
parameter.description: If this threshold is reached, flushing will occur in the background, during which time the buffer is still available for writing.

parameter.name: autoFlushBufferSize
parameter.label: The size at which the buffer should be auto-flushed.
parameter.description: If this threshold is reached, flushing will occur in the background, during which time the buffer is still available for writing.

parameter.name: bufferSafeCapacity
parameter.label: The maximum size the buffer can reach before being forcibly flushed.
parameter.description: If this threshold is reached, flushing will occur in the foreground and the buffer will be locked for writing until it is finished. This should be larger than autoFlushBufferSize.

parameter.name: bufferFlushBatchSize
parameter.label: The number of updates to send to the triplestore at a time.
parameter.description: This should be the same size as, or smaller than autoFlushBufferSize.

parameter.name: RDFSchemaName
parameter.label: The name of RDF Schema in Oracle. Make sure that all sequnces and schemas are created
parameter.description: This is a string identifying the model name in Oracle, like "fedora", that will also be used when accessing the fedora_rdf_data table and the seq_fedora_rdf_data sequence.

parameter.name: PoolConnectionMinLimit
parameter.label: Connection pool is utilized in order to insert and delete data minimum size of the pool defined.
parameter.description: Must be greater than 0 At least 5 is recomended

parameter.name: PoolConnectionMaxLimit
parameter.label: Connection pool is utilized in order to insert and delete data maximum size of the pool defined
parameter.description: Must be greater than 0 recomended greater than 20

parameter.name: PoolConnectionIncrement
parameter.label: Connection pool is utilized in order to insert and delete data increment size of the pool defined

parameter.name: PoolConnectionTimeOut
parameter.label: Connection pool is utilized in order to insert and delete data connection time out defined.
